Package com.ansi.scilla.report.sixMonthRollingVolume

Class SixMonthRollingVolumeReport

java.lang.Object
com.ansi.scilla.common.ApplicationObject
com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.reportType.AnsiReport
com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.reportType.AbstractReport
com.ansi.scilla.report.reportBuilder.reportType.CustomReport
com.ansi.scilla.report.sixMonthRollingVolume.SixMonthRollingVolumeReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReportBy, ReportByDivision, ReportByDivMonthYear, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<SixMonthRollingVolumeReport>
public class SixMonthRollingVolumeReport
extends CustomReport
implements java.lang.Comparable<SixMonthRollingVolumeReport>, ReportByDivMonthYear, ReportByDivision
Six Month Rolling Volume Report. Static methods make<format> accept a number of 6-month reports to get created. Be careful, because each report requires it's own connection, and system resources can get consumed quickly. All reports are created simultaneously and then combined.
Author:
dclewis
See Also:

    • buildReport

      public static SixMonthRollingVolumeReport buildReport​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.Integer divisionId, java.lang.Integer month, java.lang.Integer year) throws java.lang.Exception
      Create a 6-Month Rolling Volume report object for a single 6-month period
      Parameters:
      conn - Database Connection
      divisionId - Division Filter
      month - Month of the year (1-12)
      year - 4-digit year (eg 2017, not 17)
      Returns:
      Report Object
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - something bad happened

    • buildReport

      public static java.util.List<SixMonthRollingVolumeReport> buildReport​(java.util.List<java.sql.Connection> connectionList, java.lang.Integer divisionId, java.util.Calendar startDate) throws java.lang.Exception
      Create list of 6-Month Rolling Volume Report objects for sequential 6-month periods. The number of periods is dependent on the number of connections in the list
      Parameters:
      connectionList - Database connections for parallel processing of report builds
      divisionId - Division Filter
      startDate - Start Date
      Returns:
      Report Object
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Something bad happened
